news.content:
üóû ThreeFold in the News üóû


‚ÄúThreeFold, a disruptive tech project, has recognized an underlying issue and is determined to solve it by providing a decentralized internet infrastructure and peer-to-peer cloud solution‚Ä¶


Any digital workload can be hosted natively on the ThreeFold Grid with minimum migration, including cloud alternatives, blockchains, IoT networks, decentralized organizations and applications.‚Äù


Ambitious startup to disrupt the Internet and Cloud, via Business Insider Africa.


Full article here.
news.excerpt: Ambitious startup to disrupt the Internet and Cloud, via Business Insider Africa.
